thread.title: Alexis Sanchez's dogs now have their own banner at the Emirates Stadium
thread.title_full: Alexis Sanchez's dogs now have their own banner at the Emirates Stadium

title: Alexis Sanchez's dogs now have their own banner at the Emirates Stadium
text:
Alexis Sanchez's dogs now have their own banner at the Emirates Stadium Getty Images 0 20 Jan 2017 19:57:45 Arsenal fans' latest bid to persuade their star man to sign a new contract has seen them pay a remarkable tribute to his beloved Atom and Humber EXTRA TIME 
The campaign to persuade Alexis Sanchez to stay at Arsenal has taken a bizarre new turn. 
With his contract running down, Gunners fans are pulling out all the stops to convince their star man the Emirates Stadium is the place to be - not just for him, but also his dogs. A video posted by Alexis Sanchez (@alexis_officia1) on Dec 23, 2015 at 8:50am PST 
Alexis' love affair with his two pets, Atom and Humber, has become the stuff of legend on social media, with the Chilean creating a dedicated Instagram account for them and even stitching their names on his boots. 
And in an apparent attempt by fans to show that their love for the player extends to his family, a banner dedicated to the dogs is now taking pride of place at the Emirates.
